results.description: Some DIY projects are too ambitious for most beginners. But there are plenty of household tasks you can tackle without specialized expertise or experience.

Painting is the ultimate DIY project for newbies. ... You don’t need to be an art school grad to paint a room. Beginners will love the fact that painting is an inexpensive, low-risk job that offers instant gratification. “Just by painting your walls, you’ll uplift the look of your home in an instant,” says Michelle Swier, owner and partner of MKE Design Build in Milwaukee.

The best DIY projects for newbies are the ones that make the biggest impact for the least amount of money and effort. Swapping out your cabinet and door hardware fits this bill. Walk around your home and determine which hardware doesn’t match or could use an upgrade. “Don’t be surprised that you may find several different finishes and styles that are ready to be swapped,” Swier says. “This is a great beginner DIY task that can give your home that fresh look.”

Some projects, like renovating your entire kitchen or turning a closet into a full bathroom, are too ambitious for most beginners. But even if you’re a DIY newbie, there are plenty of projects you can tackle without specialized expertise or experience.
